header.title: Bufo Alvarius Contraindications
header.subtitle: Safety is sacred. This page outlines who should NOT participate in Bufo Alvarius ceremonies.
header.description: 5-MeO-DMT is a powerful medicine. These contraindications exist to protect your life and wellbeing. Please read carefully and honestly assess your situation.

notice.title: This is not optional guidance
notice.text: These contraindications are absolute. If any apply to you, we cannot facilitate a ceremony for you. This is not rejection—it's protection. Some conditions can be life-threatening when combined with 5-MeO-DMT.

medications.title: Medication Contraindications
medications.description: The following medications interact dangerously with 5-MeO-DMT and must be discontinued for a specific period before ceremony.
medications.warning: Never stop medications without consulting your prescribing doctor.

items.name: MAOIs
items.description: (Monoamine Oxidase Inhibitors) - Including Nardil, Parnate, Marplan, and Ayahuasca/Harmaline. Minimum 14 days off required.

items.name: SSRIs
items.description: (Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors) - Prozac, Zoloft, Lexapro, Celexa, Paxil, etc. Minimum 2-6 weeks off required depending on medication.

items.name: SNRIs
items.description: (Serotonin-Norepinephrine Reuptake Inhibitors) - Effexor, Cymbalta, Pristiq. Minimum 2-4 weeks off required.

items.name: Tricyclic Antidepressants
items.description: - Amitriptyline, Nortriptyline, Imipramine. Minimum 2 weeks off required.

items.name: Lithium
items.description: - Extremely dangerous combination. Cannot participate.

items.name: Tramadol
items.description: - Risk of serotonin syndrome. Minimum 1 week off required.

items.name: Benzodiazepines
items.description: - Xanax, Valium, Klonopin, Ativan. May reduce effectiveness and require tapering plan.

items.name: Antipsychotics
items.description: - Seroquel, Risperdal, Abilify. Contraindicated; requires psychiatric consultation.

items.name: Blood Pressure Medications
items.description: - Some interactions possible. Requires case-by-case evaluation.

items.name: St. John's Wort
items.description: - Natural SSRI. Minimum 2 weeks off required.

items.name: 5-HTP
items.description: - Serotonin precursor. Minimum 1 week off required.

note.text: This is not a complete list. Always disclose ALL medications, supplements, and substances during screening. When in doubt, we discuss it together.

cardiovascular.title: Cardiovascular Conditions
cardiovascular.description: 5-MeO-DMT causes temporary but significant increases in heart rate and blood pressure. The following conditions are absolute contraindications:

items.name: Heart disease
items.description: - Including coronary artery disease, heart failure, cardiomyopathy

items.name: Uncontrolled high blood pressure
items.description: - Hypertension that is not well-managed

items.name: History of heart attack or stroke
Arrhythmias
items.description: - Irregular heartbeat, atrial fibrillation

items.name: Aneurysms
items.description: - Brain or aortic aneurysms

items.name: Recent surgery
items.description: - Within the last 6 months

psychiatric.title: Psychiatric & Neurological Conditions
psychiatric.description: 5-MeO-DMT is a powerful psychedelic that can destabilize vulnerable mental states. The following conditions are contraindicated:

items.name: Schizophrenia
items.description: - Personal or strong family history

items.name: Psychotic disorders
items.description: - Any history of psychosis, psychotic breaks, or delusional thinking

items.name: Bipolar disorder
items.description: - Type I or II, especially with manic episodes

items.name: Severe personality disorders
items.description: - Borderline, antisocial, or schizotypal personality disorder

items.name: Active suicidal ideation
items.description: - Current suicidal thoughts or recent attempt

items.name: Psychiatric hospitalization
items.description: - Within the last year

items.name: Severe depression
items.description: - Currently in a severe depressive episode

items.name: Severe anxiety disorders
items.description: - Unmanaged panic disorder or severe PTSD

items.name: Dissociative disorders
items.description: - DID or severe dissociation

items.name: Recent major trauma
items.description: - Within the last 6 months

items.name: Epilepsy or seizure disorders
items.description: - Any history of seizures

items.name: Traumatic brain injury
items.description: - Recent or severe TBI

pregnancy.title: Pregnancy & Nursing
pregnancy.text: 5-MeO-DMT should never be taken during pregnancy or while breastfeeding. The effects on fetal development are unknown and potentially harmful.
pregnancy.label: Absolute contraindication.

items.name: Severe asthma
items.description: - Uncontrolled or requiring daily steroids

items.name: COPD
items.description: - Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease

items.name: Sleep apnea
items.description: - Severe or untreated

items.name: Glaucoma
items.description: - 5-MeO-DMT increases intraocular pressure

items.name: Liver or kidney disease
items.description: - Severe impairment affecting metabolism

items.name: Diabetes
items.description: - Uncontrolled or insulin-dependent (requires assessment)

items.name: Active addiction
items.description: - Currently in active substance abuse (alcohol, opioids, stimulants)

items.name: Recent psychedelic use
items.description: - Wait at least 2 weeks between psychedelic experiences

items.name: Cannabis
items.description: - Abstain for at least 24-48 hours before ceremony

items.name: Alcohol
items.description: - Abstain for at least 48 hours before ceremony

age.title: Age Requirements
age.text: Participants must be at least 21 years old. The brain continues developing until approximately age 25, and powerful psychedelics are not recommended for developing minds.

questions.title: Questions?
questions.unsure: If you're unsure whether a condition applies to you
questions.unsureText: — ask. It's always better to discuss than to assume. Some conditions require individual assessment rather than automatic exclusion.
questions.contraindicatedText: — this doesn't mean you can't do deep healing work. We offer integration sessions, energy healing, family constellations, and mentorship that don't involve medicine.
questions.medicationsText: — never stop medications without consulting your prescribing doctor first. We can discuss a safe tapering timeline together, but medical supervision is essential.

cta.text: If you've read through this page and believe you're a safe candidate for Bufo Alvarius ceremony, the next step is the screening questionnaire.
cta.note: All screening information is kept strictly confidential.
